At Hostinfuse , we recognize that all projects have different goals & requirements and our support 
will work tirelessly to ensure each and every one of our customers has their needs met. 
 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------! 

<u>**_Main Features_**</u>
 
* Technical Support Available 24/7/365
* 7 Day Money Back Guarantee 
* 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
* 1 Gbps Uplink Port Speeds
* Hardware RAID 10 Protected Pure SSD's
* Enterprise Hardware
* Complete root access
* OpenVZ
* DDOS Protected
* Instant Setup
 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!

<ul>1 GB Ram</ul>
